TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit CallContext extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一組隨附於執行程式碼路徑的屬性。

span.span: Provides a set of properties that are carried with the execution code path.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類似於方法呼叫的執行緒區域儲存區的特製化的集合物件，提供對每個邏輯執行緒都是唯一的資料位置。 is a specialized collection object similar to a Thread Local Storage for method calls and provides data slots that are unique to each logical thread of execution. 位置不會在其他邏輯執行緒上呼叫內容間共用。The slots are not shared across call contexts on other logical threads. 可以將物件加入至傳輸關閉和重新執行的程式碼路徑，並檢驗各種物件沿著路徑。Objects can be added to the as it travels down and back up the execution code path, and examined by various objects along the path. 當進行遠端方法呼叫，以在另一個物件、類別會產生傳輸以及遠端呼叫的執行個體。When a remote method call is made to an object in another , the class generates a instance that travels along with the remote call. 只有物件該公開介面，並儲存在外傳播中。Only objects that expose the interface and are stored in the are propagated outside the in a . 不支援這個介面的物件就不會傳輸在具有遠端方法呼叫的執行個體。Objects that do not support this interface are not transmitted in instances with remote method calls. > [!NOTE] > 中的所有方法是靜態的而且在目前呼叫內容上運作。All methods in are static and operate on the call context in the current . > [!NOTE] > 此類別可讓連結要求。This class makes a link demand. A`SecurityException`立即呼叫者沒有基礎結構的權限則會擲回。A `SecurityException` is thrown if the immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission. 請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) for more information. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別來傳輸[Principal 和 Identity 物件](~/docs/standard/security/principal-and-identity-objects.md)識別的遠端位置。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to transmit [Principal and Identity Objects](~/docs/standard/security/principal-and-identity-objects.md) to a remote location for identification. 若要檢視的程式碼`LogicalCallContextData`類別用在此範例中，請參閱範例的介面。To view the code for the `LogicalCallContextData` class used in this sample, see the example for the interface. 若要檢視的程式碼`HelloServiceClass`類別用在此範例中，請參閱範例的方法。To view the code for the `HelloServiceClass` class used in this sample, see the example for the method. 若要檢視此範例中使用的伺服器類別的程式碼，請參閱範例類別。To view the code for the server class used in this sample, see the example for the class. [!code-cpp[CallContext#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CallContext/CPP/client.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CallContext#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CallContext/CS/client.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CallContext#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/CallContext/VB/client.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範建立具名的資料位置上顯示的值，傳回從邏輯執行緒，並釋出該具名的資料位置的具名的資料位置的遠端物件呼叫方法的用戶端。The following code example shows a client creating a named data slot, calling a method on the remote object that displays the value of the named data slot that was returned from the logical thread, and frees that named data slot.
